code: export var capitalizeLetter=function capitalizeLetter(word){if(!word)return'';return word.split("-").map(function(part){return part.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+part.slice(1);}).join(" ");};export var formatIdxNum=function formatIdxNum(idx){var arr=[idx].toString().split('');for(var i=0;i<5;i++){if(arr.length>4){break;}else if(arr.length<4){arr.unshift('0');}}return arr;};export var formatUnit=function formatUnit(unit){return(unit*0.1).toFixed(1);};export var formatFeet=function formatFeet(h){var meters=(h*0.1).toFixed(1);var totalInches=meters*39.37;var feet=Math.floor(totalInches/12);var inches=Math.round(totalInches%12);return{feet:feet,inches:inches};};export var formatPounds=function formatPounds(w){var kilogram=(w*0.1).toFixed(1);return(kilogram*2.2).toFixed(1);};
